original_text: According to all that the Lord commanded Moses, so the children of Israel made all the work.
korean_text: 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 이스라엘 자손이 모든 역사를 마치매

sentences.original_text: According to all that the Lord commanded Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 모세에게 명령하신 모든 것에 따라

sentences.original_text: so the children of Israel made all the work
